short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: keep up to date on amazon price changes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate Starter Pack's Amazon Companion is the easy way to track Amazon product prices! Simply navigate to an amazon product page, click 'watch now,' and the Amazon Companion will keep track of the rest. Each time you open the extension, it will check each product you've saved, and notify you of a price drop.
